comments.body: BTW, the way is [what GitHub Actions community suggested](https://github.community/t/run-step-if-file-exists/16445/3).

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +19,23 @@      run: |
        if ls **/target/test-reports/*.xml > /dev/null 2>&1; then
          echo '::set-output name=FILE_EXISTS::true'
        else
          echo '::set-output name=FILE_EXISTS::false'
